description:
Throughout the first eight episodes of the fourth season of Agents of S.H.I.E.L.D., the focus was largely on the newest anti-hero Ghost Rider (Gabriel Luna). When the spotlight was not shined on Ghost Rider or introducing new director Jeffrey Mace (Jason O’Mara), the series took the time to introduce a third prominent new cast member with the first Life Model Decoy, named Aida (Mallory Jansen).《神盾局特工》第四季前八集的焦点就是最新的恶灵骑士（Gabriel Luna饰）。当大众的注意力不再集中在恶灵骑士或者神盾局新局长Jeffrey Mace（Jason O’Mara饰）时，后半季的第三个突出的看点就是新卡司——第一个LMD，叫做Aida（Mallory Jansen饰）。

Agents of S.H.I.E.L.D season 4 continues on Tuesday, January 10, 2017 at 10pm on ABC.《神盾局特工》第四季将在2017年1月10日周二晚10点在ABC继续播出。

声明：本双语文章的中文翻译系沪江英语原创内容，转载请注明出处。中文翻译仅代表译者个人观点，仅供参考。如有不妥之处，欢迎指正。
